bug.author: 17patelumang
bug.summary: Create serving graph separately from training
bug.description: OS Platform and Distribution : macOS Catalina 10.15.3 TensorFlow installed from : binary TensorFlow version : 1.15.0 Python version: 3.7.3 Can we get example of this - <denchmark-link:https://cloud.google.com/ai-platform/prediction/docs/exporting-savedmodel-for-prediction#create_serving_graph_separately_from_training>https://cloud.google.com/ai-platform/prediction/docs/exporting-savedmodel-for-prediction#create_serving_graph_separately_from_training</denchmark-link> , its not very clear from docs I basically have checkpoint file and what to convert that into .pb file with feature transformation part of it . I already have code for converting to feature using TF API .

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/17patelumang>@17patelumang</denchmark-link>
